title: Late Notes, from the MTA and Sadie Stein
teaser: The Paris Review deputy editor Sadie Stein says the subway made her late to the studio…and she has a note from the MTA to prove it.  Really.   She also takes us through the most dinner-party-worthy bits of the current issue, Number 207.
contentencoded: The Paris Review deputy editor Sadie Stein says the subway made her late to the studio…and she has a note from the MTA to prove it.  Really.   She also takes us through the most dinner-party-worthy bits of the current issue, Number 207.
